items.name: Sent Email Tracking
items.info: Capture a log of emails sent by Craft that can be viewed in the Control Panel and help with customer relationship workflows or debugging.

items.name: Sent Email Preview
items.info: View details about Sent Emails such as who they were sent to, when they were sent, and snapshot of the Sent Email HTML

items.name: Resend Sent Emails
items.info: Resend a copy of captured emails to the same user or a new email address
